page.title: 02Amenities
page.content: The amenities in this area are mainly centred in Bildeston with a few in Hitcham and even fewer in Naughton. T ere has been a reduction in the n mber of retail outlets with at least two shops now vacant.Included in the data are mainly businesses which are run from home such as electrical,plumbing and building. In the last two decades a Health Centre with three doctors and associated staff has been set up.On adjacent land a five class primary school has been built.This serves the five parishes of Bildeston,Wattisham,Nedging,Hitcham and Naughton. In a similar vein wardened old peoples' flats and bungalows have been built. There is a sportsfield with a portacabin at Bildeston,which supports cricket and football teams.
